title: What is the interpretation of seeing school in a dream?

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of repeatedly seeing school in a dream, as it is one of the strange dreams, especially for someone who finished his studies a long time ago and sees in his dream that he is returning to school or taking exams. Or he misses his studies, and wakes up from his sleep feeling very surprised and does not know what the dream that he saw means, and through the following lines from the encyclopedia, we will learn in detail about the frequent vision of school or study in a dream. Interpretation of seeing school in a dream The meaning of seeing school in a dream Dream interpreters say that a person Who has finished his studies and sees again and again in his dream that he is returning to study, then this vision expresses the anxiety and fears that the person lives about the future and is associated with anxiety about the future life, livelihood, money and how to manage them, and we advise this person to seek help from God and not to worry about the future because the unseen is in the hands of God. Almighty, and he must take the reasons and not worry. And the person who sees in his dream that he is studying in the school in which he studied, then this vision is one of the promising visions that indicates that this person has a high status and high esteem among people and that he is respected and appreciated. Those around him because of his good morals and good behavior. Whoever sees in his dream that he received a lesson in school and that he cannot remember this lesson as if he had never studied it, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is on the cusp of entering into a new experience in his life and that he is afraid. This is because he does not know what fate has in store for him. The divine must ask God for help and put aside anxiety, because it is the path that leads to failure, while new experiences, even if they do not succeed, will change his personality and develop for the better. Interpretation of a dream about a teacher repeatedly: Whoever sees the school in a dream and this dream is repeated more than once, then this The vision indicates that the dreamer feels that he is missing and misses someone who is missing from him and that he thinks about this person a lot. Some commentators said that if anyone sees the school repeatedly in his dream, his dreams indicate that he is going through recurring problems and crises that negatively affect his emotions. Repeat seeing the school in a dream One of the promising visions for an unmarried girl is that she often sees the school or something related to it in her dream, and its interpretation varies according to the details of the dream: If an unmarried girl sees a school in her dream, this dream means that she will hear good news in her life in the near future, as well as the stability of her circumstances. Emotionality and the success of her relationship with her partner. And if she sees her friends repeatedly at school, if they are girl friends, then this dream promises her that she will live years of happiness and the end of sadness and problems. If she sees her male classmates, this dream symbolizes that the girl is doing her best to achieve the dream she is looking for. If she sees that she is returning to her primary school again and again, this indicates that the girl is suffering from some problems in her life and she cannot control them, but If she sees that she is going back to middle school or high school, this means that you will get engaged or get married soon. Repeated vision

title: All the evidence that we saw the study in a dream is according to Ibn Sirin and the great commentators

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a study in a dream? Dreams are this world parallel to our real world, and there are many similarities between the dream and reality in many details. You may wake up from your dream as if you are on an interesting adventure, and you may wake up happy or sad, or perhaps the messages that reach us through this, and school is one of the things that many people see in dreams, and we are also confused in the interpretation and meaning of this dream. Interpretation of the dream of studying in a dream. There is much evidence and more than one interpretation. What was mentioned by sheikhs and scholars in interpreting the vision of studying in a dream, and it is as follows: The dream of studying indicates the state of attention and mental concentration in which the dreamer lives, and the school heralds the abundance of means of livelihood. Seeing a person entering the school indicates his marriage to a girl of good character, and it also appears that The mother is satisfied with the dreamer. The interpretation of the teacher’s vision indicates success in life and achieving goals. As for the man’s vision of the school, it indicates his wife. Attending school has many meanings, including that the dreamer is a person who loves science and longs for knowledge. However, if the dream relates to difficulty and exhaustion from studying, this means that the dreamer will face Obstacles and problems in his life. Being expelled from school or being expelled from school is a warning message to the dreamer and warns him that he may be expelled from his job or fail in life or warns him in the event of a fall. In his worship, he should stay away from disobedience and committing sins, and warn him of the necessity of returning, repenting, and drawing closer to God. Study in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets this vision as an indication of the dreamer’s condition and the state of his world. If he sees in his dream that he is successful and excelling in his studies, then it symbolizes excellence and success in his real life and that he will achieve his dreams and aspirations in life. If a pregnant woman sees herself while she is going to school, this indicates her good health and an indication that she will give birth soon and that she and her child’s health will be healthy. If a person has finished his studies and sees that he has returned to studying again, but has failed many times and returned the year because of his failure, then this dream indicates that he is living in suffering due to the stress and pressure prevailing in his life. And his fear of the future, and it may indicate his dismissal from his job. Dreaming about old friends from school and playing with them means hearing a lot of happy news in a row, but if the dreamer is single and sees himself playing with his friends, this means that she will get married soon. As for whoever sees that he is sitting in class First in the class, it means that the dreamer will have a distinguished position among his classmates, and the vision indicates that his dreams and aspirations will soon come true. Seeing the same person eating with his classmates is good news for the dreamer and its interpretation is that he will earn a lot of money and a halal life in the coming period. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that dreaming of school bells ringing means that the dreamer may fall into a major crisis and face some financial problems. Dancing and singing in school may indicate that the dreamer has bad morals and commits many sins and angers God with many sins. Dream of studying for singles Interpretation of dream of studying for singles

title: Interpretation of a dream about children’s corpses in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the corpses of dead children in a dream If you, dear reader, want to know what the interpretation of a dream about the corpses of dead children in a dream is, we learn all this and more details..Interpretation of a dream about the corpses of children in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about corpses of children in a dream The body of a strange child can be It is a sign of freedom from anxiety, and God knows the unseen. When you see the body of a child you do not know, it expresses freedom from anxiety. If the dreamer sees the body of a child he knows in a dream, it may be a sign of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Whereas if a married man sees the body of a child he knows, it may be a sign of anxiety and sadness. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. The interpretation of a dream when you see someone killing another person with a gun in a dream. The interpretation of dreams to see someone killing another person with a gun in a dream is psychological pressure, and God knows the unseen, since seeing someone killing another person with a gun can mean pressure and anxiety, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself being killed with a gun, he may This is a sign of a financial crisis, and God knows best. When you see someone killing a familiar person with a gun, this may indicate gossip, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone kill a child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone kill a child in a dream, and killing a child can indicate the psychological state that links him In the past, and God knows the unseen, where if the dreamer sees someone killing a child, this may lead to his psychological state because of the past. When you see a child killed, this can lead to memories from his childhood that affect him, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone killing my sister in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about someone killing my sister in a dream. We did not find Specific interpretations to see thatHowever, seeing someone kill someone can be a sign of pride and strength, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees someone killed in a dream, it may be evidence that he is thinking about repentance, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees someone being killed with a knife This indicates problems and obstacles, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone killing me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone killing me in a dream could be a sign of goodness and benevolence, and God knows the unseen. Whereas if a married man sees someone killing him in a dream, this may be a sign that he will benefit from it. And God knows everything that no one saw. If the dreamer sees him being killed, this may lead to a connection, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees someone killing her, she may marry him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my father, who killed me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father, who killed me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations. Let us see that except that seeing someone killing you in a dream could be a sign of goodness and benevolence, and God knows the unseen. When you see someone killing you in a dream, it may be a sign of sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man sees someone killing him in a dream, this may indicate waiting or Victory, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of hearing news of a murder in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hearing news of a murder in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, hearing the news of the death of a living person can indicate age and age

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a house in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a house in a dream, a new house, moving to a new house, the meaning of a new apartment, an old house, the interpretation of a dream about an unclean house, the house falling, the interpretation of building a house, the collapse of the house, the dream of the new apartment, the abandoned house, all of this will explain For you today when interpreting a dream about a dream house according to the most important jurists and scholars. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a house: The interpretation of seeing a house in a dream, as mentioned by the scholar Ibn Sirin, is that it indicates a married woman; Because they resemble the corners of the house. Dreaming of a new house in a dream is evidence of a healthy body, physical strength, and well-being for me. Seeing a beautiful house in a dream means marrying a beautiful woman like this house. Seeing an old, spacious house in a dream indicates many fears, sorrows, and disasters that The viewer passes through it. Interpretation of a dream about an old, dirty house in a dream is evidence of the instability of the visionary’s life and his susceptibility to disease. The dream of seeing a strange and unfamiliar house in a dream indicates death and graves. Seeing yourself moving to a new house in a dream is evidence that circumstances have changed for the better, Poverty to wealth, sins to repentance, sadness to joy and distress to relief. The interpretation of seeing an iron house in a dream indicates the longevity of the vision and the fulfillment of desires. Interpretation of seeing a house for a single woman: Seeing a new house in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence that she will start a new beginning in Her life may be in a privileged position or she may marry a suitable man. The interpretation of a dream about an apartment with a beautiful view in a dream for a single woman indicates joy and happiness in her life. The dream interpretation of a large and spacious house for a woman in a dream indicates an imminent marriage that will change her life for the better. As for the dream of an old house in a dream A single fiancé indicates that she is linked to an inappropriate person who can cause her unhappiness. Single people see that she bought an old house in her dream, this indicates that she is marrying a poor man, but she loves him and will be happy with him. Seeing an old house collapsing in a dream for an unmarried woman means that you You will face many problems, but they will soon disappear and end. A new house in a divorced woman’s dream indicates her new marriage to someone who will compensate her for the past. Interpretation of seeing a house for a married woman: The interpretation of a dream about a new, spacious house for a married woman in a dream is a sign of good news for her and her family and an imminent pregnancy. For those who are waiting for it. Seeing moving to another house in a married woman’s dream indicates ample living, many good things, and blessings in health, money and children. Seeing a married woman having a new and beautiful house in a dream means that she will get rid of all problems, her fears will disappear, and her sadness will turn into joys. The dream of seeing an old house in a married woman’s dream indicates her husband’s large debts, poverty, and illness, and may also indicate marital disputes. The interpretation of repairing a house in a dream for a married woman shows that she is trying to overcome all the obstacles and problems she faces and may indicate that she is the best support for her husband and children. Vision. Demolishing a married woman's house indicates that her husband has abused her

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in my hair by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in my hair, according to Ibn Sirin. Lice is one of the annoying insects that grow in the hair, and for humans it is an annoying thing. Many girls dream of lice in their hair in a dream, which explains some disturbing interpretations and evidence for the girl, but there are many disturbing things that are explained by the good thing on earth, and the interpretations differ. Depending on the social status of the priest and the circumstances surrounding him, and thus the interpretation. From a dream about lice, Ibn Sirin will recognize it in my hair. Interpretation of a dream about lice in my hair: Lice in a dream is considered one of the annoying insects for humans, especially for girls, because of the health damage it causes to the scalp. A number of other interpretations and signs, including: If one sees lice falling from his hair onto his clothes, this indicates that he will be in a high position at work and that he will receive a promotion. When a girl sees lice in her hair, this indicates that goodness is coming to her. Vision A lot of lice in a person’s dream means that he is suffering from a serious disease that causes him a lot of suffering. The spread of lice on old clothes indicates that he gave some money to someone and was afraid that he would not get it back. Interpretation of a dream about lice by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing lice and killing them in a dream as a sign To recovery from illness. Seeing a person getting rid of lice by dropping them without killing them means that he is going through financial difficulties. Seeing hair infested with white lice indicates that you will get rid of everything that worries you. If you see a wound on your head from lice, this indicates the presence of bad people in your life. Seeing lice eating the head is evidence of the danger surrounding the person. Explanation of lice coming out of the hair. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dreamer who saw lice in a dream as if coming out of his hair suffering from severe envy. When a married man sees lice bleeding from his hair, this indicates that one of his children will be injured or killed. If you see lice flying from his chest, this indicates that one of his children will besiege him. The frequent appearance of lice in the hair indicates a serious illness that causes a lot of suffering to its owner. Interpretation of seeing lice in my hair for single women. Seeing lice in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the things that indicates a serious illness. And the enemies present in her life, and the lice that walk on her head indicate poor planning and the negative thoughts that follow her, and other interpretations of this include the following: Ibn Sirin explained lice in poetry to an unmarried woman as evil people who cause corruption between her and her relatives, and indicate the money that she spends on corruption. Itchy hair in a dream due to lice in unmarried women indicates that she is demanding her rights. Lice walking in the hair of an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that she is thinking about something. Seeing lice in one person’s hair indicates illness or hostility. If a woman sees If an unmarried woman picks lice from her hair in a dream, this means that she is revealing the lies and secrets hidden from her. Many people see disturbing and strange dreams in their dreams, including the dream of seeing lice in a dream, which Ibn Sirin interpreted with different interpretations based on the condition of the dreamer, and thus Done

Many people see disturbing and strange dreams in their dreams, including the dream of seeing lice in a dream, which Ibn Sirin interpreted with different interpretations based on the condition of the dreamer, and thus Done

And when she sees her, she puts the eggs on the fire until they boil. This indicates She will marry a qualified person, God willing. Boiled eggs that are bitter when she eats them are not good, as this indicates that she will face difficulties in her life. On the contrary, eating hard-boiled eggs that taste good is a sign that she will succeed in the life of a student, God willing. title: Interpretation of a dream about bees in the house

preview.html: But is seeing palm trees in a dream a sign of kindness or not, so today we will give you the interpretation of a dream about bees in the house, so follow us in the following lines from your website gptafser.com/.Interpretation of a dream about bees in the house in a dream for one girl. Seeing bees in A dream for an unmarried girl means that this girl will obtain a distinguished position. She is considered one of the most distinguished figures in her work among her friends and acquaintances. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream many swarms of bees near her, this is evidence that she will achieve a lot of goodness, God willing, in Her life next time, God willing. When an unmarried girl dreams of being stung by a bee. This indicates this girl’s need to achieve what she dreams and wants, and God knows best. I hope that these wishes will come true in the near future, God willing. Seeing an unmarried girl means bees in The dream. An indication of happiness, joy and happiness that she will achieve in the coming days, God willing. A single girl seeing bees in her dreams. This may indicate that she will obtain a lot of goodness and abundance in her life, God willing. Note that bees in a dream are a sign of achieving goals and dreams, and God knows best. Watch. Also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing bees in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dream of bees in the house in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream refers to bees. This dream may indicate some stability that this married woman is experiencing in her life, and God knows best. But if the married woman dreams that She was stung by a bee while she was in the house. This indicates that he will achieve what he dreamed of, God willing, in the near future, God willing. When a married woman saw in her dream that she was surrounded by a large number of bees, and he was circling next to her, and he was pleased with that. This shows how much A blessing that this married woman experiences in her private life, and God knows best. Many dream interpreters have interpreted that seeing bees in general in a dream is an indication of the abundance of sustenance and goodness, and the greater the number of bees, the greater the goodness of the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing bees in the house in a dream for a man Its meaning: When a man saw a lot of bees in his dream, he was walking around the bees. This may indicate a lot of good that this man is trying to do in her life, and God knows best. When a man sees bees in a dream, this means that he will hear happy and joyful news, which he will receive. Soon. A man’s dream of bees indicates that he is excelling in life and work. It may indicate a new successful project that will be presented within the next few days, God willing. When a married man sees a hive in a dream. This is evidence of the happiness he lives with his family, and God knows best. Seeing a married man In a dream with bees, it means that his wife will give birth to boys, and God knows best. When a man sees in a dream, many bees attack him. This may indicate the arrival of goodness and lawful money to him, from where he does not expect, and God knows best. Or it may indicate a bee attack on a man in The dream: for his wife to support him with the money he needs, and stand by his side in his judgment.

title: Learn the interpretation of laughter in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of laughter in a dream: When a person sees himself laughing out loud in a dream, he feels reassured and calm and expects that his coming moments will be full of joy and happy occasions. Family members and friends may participate in a large family gathering and someone will find himself laughing and rejoicing. so far. What are the most important meanings of laughter according to Ibn Sirin? What are the experts’ interpretations of laughter in a dream? We discuss it in our article. Interpretation of laughter in a dream: Laughter in a dream is one of the beautiful things that is certain to hear a lot of good news. If you were sad in the past and faced some unhappy moments, it is likely that your circumstances will improve and any situations that bother you will change, and joyful events will appear to him. If you see yourself laughing in a dream and you are happy, the interpretation is good news to get rid of distress or misfortunes that affect you, and if You shared your laughter with someone you love, your relationship with me is beautiful and he comes to you in difficult times to support you, and if a man laughs with his wife, the dream interprets her closeness to her pregnancy and saves her from anything that hurts or confuses her. Interpretation of laughter in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that laughter in a dream It has beautiful signs, especially if the person is truly happy and laughs from his heart, as this indicates getting rid of failure and sadness and diligence in achieving dreams, which means that the person is approaching wonderful moments full of vitality. Comfort and problem solving and you can understand with those around you and be happy with them if you share their laughter. It is good to laugh in your sleep, and that is not loudly, as you are happy and calm in reality, and you may hear important and beautiful news in reality, with this laughter. He fixes his eyes and sees him as the door of goodness and mercy. Interpretation of laughter in a dream for a single woman: When a girl sees that a little girl is looking at her and laughing while playing with her, the interpretation indicates the vast goodness and happy days that she lives, and if she is suffering from a lack of livelihood and prays to God to ease her circumstances, then perhaps You reach these happy people. And it is filled with calm moments. On the other hand, the meaning shows stability in work and increases what is good for you thanks to it. Single people may go through some unhappy events and go through worrying times for them if they see that there is someone laughing at them, especially if they are sad about it. Life Long and good days full of huge practical successes. The girl may share laughter with someone she really knows and the meaning is good from the strength of friendship or the deep relationship between them. However, if she laughs with someone she does not know, her actions may be baseless and she may act negatively and foolishly. The actions that affect her and her reputation, so she must avoid these corrupt things and do good on her own. Interpretation of laughter in a dream for a married woman. One of the indications of laughter for a married woman in a dream is that it is good news that the period of nutrition and pregnancy will be prolonged, God willing. It is good for a woman to see laughter in a dream and it is in a calm, non-verbal voice. High, as it confirms getting out of arguments and crises and living in days full of joy, while laughing out loud is considered a bad sign, and getting involved. In pressure

title: Seeing a dead father in a dream and you are angry

preview.html: The vision indicates the end of problems, but what if the father in the vision was angry with his children? We learn about the interpretation of this vision in this article from a translated site in the case of a wife, a man, a single man, and a single man. Interpretation of seeing a deceased father in a dream and he is angry in a dream about a single girl. The appearance of the father in a dream. Dreaming of an unmarried girl, this vision means security, goodness and justice. The vision also indicates positive change in the girl’s life, down to the smallest details that will happen to her in her reality. Seeing the father of an unmarried girl in her dream, but he is angry, suggests another interpretation. To practice this The girl lives her life with actions that anger her father, and that he is dissatisfied with those actions. It means that the girl has taken a dangerous step in her life and the father does not approve of her. The dead father’s look in the single girl’s dream about her while he is angry. This vision means a look of accusation and preaching on the part of the father. Most commentators believe The general appearance of the dead person with anger means the fortuneteller’s rebuke and guilt. See also: Interpretation of dreams of a dead father hugging his daughter. Interpretation of seeing a deceased father in a dream while he is angry in a dream with a married woman. The interpretation of this vision from the point of view of scholars and commentators does not differ from the interpretation of seeing an unmarried girl. Others see it as a sign. On the great wealth of this married woman. If a married woman sees her father angry in her dream, this is evidence of her mistakes in her life. Or seeing an angry father in a married woman’s dream is a warning of a certain thing or undesirable behavior. The father’s anger in a dream indicates His responsibility for what he sees as his son in reality. As for the married woman who sees her father dead in a dream and he is angry, she does not want to talk to him. This means that he is doing things that are not right. The married woman must retract her actions when she sees her father angry in a dream, because he is not satisfied with This behavior. Interpretation of seeing a dead father in a dream and he is angry in a dream about a man and its meaning. For a man to see in a dream that his deceased father is angry with him, this means that this person will benefit him greatly. Most commentators believe that seeing a dead father angry in a man’s dream means: This man wants From his father to preach to him and accuse him of something. Or this vision indicates the father’s request specifically for his son to reach the womb, even if he fails to do so. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about my deceased husband having sex with meInterpretation of seeing a deceased father in a dream and he is angry in The dream for a young man and its meaning: A young man sees his father dead in a dream and becomes angry with him. This vision shows many good things that the son will bring, and that his father cares about his safety. This vision also shows that the father blames his son for an act that angered him. When a young man sees his dead father in a dream, he becomes angry with him The vision means that this young man committed a sin and that his father appeared in the dream to accuse him. Among interpreters, the father’s anger in a dream does not mean dissatisfaction in all circumstances. Sometimes the father's anger is beneficial to the viewer. A single young man sees his deceased father angry in a dream. This vision may indicate good news about his success at work or study. This may indicate...

title: Interpretation of seeing my mother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation: The mother is the warm heart to which children feel that they belong to her permanently. She is one of the most influential people in children’s lives and has an excellent position in their lives. Therefore, mothers often appear in people’s dreams, and the meaning of their appearance varies according to the situation in which they appear. In it and according to the mother’s position in the fortuneteller’s life, so in this article we will learn about the interpretation of I see my mother in a dream. According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my mother in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: If the sleeper sees his mother in a dream, this is a vision that portends relief from distress and the disappearance of worries. Seeing a mother happy and in good condition in a dream gives the dreamer great strength And good, tremendous and blessed. If the sleeper sees in his dream that his mother is standing inside his house, then this is a good vision that promises him that goodness will prevail for all members of this house. Seeing yourself talking with your mother in a dream means that you will hear happy news in the near future. When a married woman dreams of her mother, this is a vision Good, indicating the stability of her marital life. If the sleeper sees in his dream that his mother is crying, then this is an unpleasant vision that indicates that the mother will fall ill if she is alive, but if the mother dies, then this vision indicates the dreamer’s illness. Seeing the mother dead in a dream, while she is alive in reality, is a vision that warns the dreamer of the upcoming problems that he will suffer from on his face. The scholar Ibn Sirin says: If the sleeper sees in his dream that his mother is calling him in a loud voice, then this vision shows his shortcomings towards her. Seeing the mother screaming Loud voice in a dream means the death of the mother or the death of the fortuneteller, and God Almighty alone knows the time. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the symbol of the mother in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is kissing her mother’s hand, then this is a vision that indicates the date of her engagement or marriage to a good man, and she will receive Much sustenance and kindness blessed upon her arrival. Days. If an unmarried girl sees her mother in a dream, this vision indicates that the girl needs expert advice on many important issues in her life. Seeing a mother screaming loudly in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the difficulties and problems that the girl faces in her dream. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that her mother is happy, then this is a good vision that conveys to the dreamer the happy news that he will hear soon. Seeing an angry mother in an unmarried girl’s dream is an unpleasant vision and indicates the failure of the girl who dreamed of her mother, and if the mother is already dead and the girl sees This vision is a warning to pray for. Her deceased mother and gives her alms. Seeing a mother hitting a girl in a dream means that the girl will know many things that were not known about her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mother in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that her mother is sad, then this vision indicates the coming of sorrows and worries in the coming period. Seeing her kissing her mother’s cheek in a dream is a good vision, promising for the dreamer to obtain kindness and livelihood, as indicated by...

Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mother in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that her mother is sad, then this vision indicates the coming of sorrows and worries in the coming period.
